sentences.en: A laboratory must be kept in good order.
sentences.cn: 实验室里必须保持井井有条.

sentences.en: Did you perceive anyone entering the laboratory?
sentences.cn: 你看见有人进入实验室 吗 ?

sentences.en: He would stay for hours at a stretch in the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 他在实验室里一蹲就是好几个小时.

sentences.en: In a large, well-endowed school, the opportunities for laboratory work are likely to be greater.
sentences.cn: 在一所规模庞大且资金充足的学校，可能会有更多机会参与实验室的研究工作。

sentences.en: Laboratory work needs not only accurate measurements but also correct calculation.
sentences.cn: 实验工作不但需要准确的测量,而且需要准确的计算.

sentences.en: Our laboratory equipment isn't perfect, but we must make do.
sentences.cn: 实验室设备是不够理想, 但我们只好因陋就简.
在实验室动物身上做的试验

sentences.en: The athletes'reflexes were tested under laboratory conditions.
sentences.cn: 在实验室条件下测试了这些运动员的反应能力.

sentences.en: the cartoon figure of the mad scientist working in his laboratory
sentences.cn: 疯狂的科学家在实验室工作的卡通形象

sentences.en: The effects of weathering can be simulated in the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 在实验室里可以模拟各种天气产生的影响.

sentences.en: The equipment of the laboratory is complete.
These laboratory instruments are of our own making.
sentences.cn: 这些实验仪器都是我们自己制造的.

sentences.en: They will proceed to build another laboratory building.
sentences.cn: 他们将着手建造另一座实验大楼.

sentences.en: to study behaviour in laboratory and naturalistic settings
sentences.cn: 研究实验室里的以及仿自然环境中的行为

sentences.en: We took full advantage of the laboratory's equipments.
sentences.cn: 我们充分利用实验室的设备.

phrases.tran_cn: 实验室设备；实验室仪器
科学实验室；自然实验室

trans.tran_cn: 实验室，实验课，研究室，药厂
trans.tran_en: a special room or building in which a scientist does tests or prepares substances
